body_intro: This is an automated email response from GetTor.
links_body_links:
You will need only one of the links below to download the bundle. If a link does not work for you, try the next one.

links_body_archive: Should you have issues with any of the links above you can access the following archives:
help_body_intro: GetTor can send you download links for Tor Browser.
help_body_support: Simply reply to this email and write the operating system you want to install Tor Browser on in your response. We support the following operating systems:
help_body_respond: GetTor will then respond with download instructions.
help_body_locale: If you want Tor Browser in a language other than English, mention one of the following language codes in your response:
help_body_example:
For example, if you want Tor Browser for {} in {} your email content will look like:

smtp_unsupported_locale_msg: The locale you requested '{}' is not supported.
